doc.field: descriptionLong Night lyrics in hindi and English from A Scandal.

Hindi Lyrics > A Scandal > Long Night Following is the lyrics of 'Long Night' song from hindi movie 'A Scandal'. Song: Long Night Movie: A Scandal Singer(s): Shivangi Bhayana & IKKA Music By: Ikka, Arko, Amjad, Nadeem, Bapi-Tutul Long Night Lyrics from A Scandal
Aise na dekho kuch kuch hota hai Aaj kal na mera sune bina sota hai Baahon main lekar baitha rehta hai Na mere hoonth hile na Dekho na woh kuch kehta hai Ohh..tu zulf se khile meri Tode angadayi meri Bhul ke duniya sari Le main ho gayi teri Sayya muzhko good night na kehne deta hai Its long night Its long night Its long night Yaar na muzhko sone deta hai Its long night Its long night Its long night Khud na muzhse yeh door hone deta hai Long night... I sware jab muzhe touch kare tu Udde lakhon titliyaa.. Udde lakhon titliyaa.. Sikhungi pyar ke jab tak Karungi na galtiya.. Karungi na galtiya.. Tanhaiya na mai feel karu Jab saath main hota tu Baby har saans ke saath kahu Sayya muzhko good night Na kehne deta hai Its long night Its long night Its long night Yaar na muzhko sone deta hai Its long night Its long night Its long night Khud na muzhse yeh juda hone deta hai Long night... Eik raat yeh imaan aur tu mere saath Kabse sa tha pyasa aaj mili barsaat hai Aas yeh jaga ke pyass yeh badhake Good night keh ke sou rahi ho Yeh bhi koi baat hai Chal waisa karte hai attempt karte hai Aane de muzhko baby tere left side Hatade sharam karle muzhko hug tight Its long night Its long night Its long night Yaar na muzhko sone deta hai Its long night Its long night Its long night Khud na muzhse yeh juda hone deta hai Long night...
